channel.title: Rune-Sanctum Release
channel.description:
No I do not feel bad for releasing this before I did not sell a copy of it due to me losing most of the source files and client. this is just rebuilt ones.
cache: [url=https://www.sendspace.com/file/ewikx0]https://www.sendspace.com/file/ewikx0[/url] source+client: [url=https://www.sendspace.com/file/hzy9oj]https://www.sendspace.com/file/hzy9oj[/url] SQL files!: [url=https://www.sendspace.com/file/qcab18]https://www.sendspace.com/file/qcab18[/url]
[center]Core re-work for great server stability Friendly and active community Duo Slayer Dwarf multi cannon In game PvP highscores Perfect item switches for amazing hybridding Flawless combat system Client settings - Including 100% fullscreen & resizeable A unique Donator zone with many Donator benefits All skills fully working and being worked on every day Daily server and website updates A hard working owner who listens to his players Pk Points for killing players and Voting Points both with amazing reward shops Many bosses to defeat all dropping well rewarding items! Clean and efficient client, small cache size and low memory usage Many mini-games including fully working duel arena with staking The server is hosted on a powerful VPS which is ran 24/7 for 100% uptime Great combat rates so you may enjoy the server for as long as possible without losing interest fast! Max cape for players who accomplish all 99's Highscores and auto donations And many, many more features join today to see them for your self! Multi world management system! Rewrote smithing Rewrote agility rewrote herblore fixed 3 dupes. fixed some npc anims gfx and block anims. New and improved login screen redone slayer system. Fixed all the packet crashs Fixed the command system. rewrote whole command system Implemented mac ban. Implemented hwid ban. Implemented Jag Grab system. Added some newer items. Newer dungeons. And some other stuff I might of forgot. Added a d cannon bug prevention system. and much more. started working on BH System Fixed pvp tokens. Fixed some npc's and gave em names
Added every rs pet from 2007 to 2009 Added boss pets. Added Rev pets.
[URL=http://minus.com/i/HjJJkMRgH5pH][IMG]http://i.minus.com/jHjJJkMRgH5pH.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://minus.com/i/btkayo3jfipOD][IMG]http://i.minus.com/jbtkayo3jfipOD.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://minus.com/i/hwxE3YLpUzXz][IMG]http://i.minus.com/jhwxE3YLpUzXz.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://minus.com/i/oiDvrFNweYhp][IMG]http://i.minus.com/joiDvrFNweYhp.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://minus.com/i/0cGABrqV8tuY][IMG]http://i.minus.com/j0cGABrqV8tuY.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://minus.com/i/bnDeNlL64A47K][IMG]http://i.minus.com/jbnDeNlL64A47K.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://minus.com/i/brFDnLsvsnQ6h][IMG]http://i.minus.com/jbrFDnLsvsnQ6h.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://minus.com/i/bqJHdtFqkI4Oo][IMG]http://i.minus.com/jbqJHdtFqkI4Oo.png[/img][/URL]
credits to: zion client work riipiinftw server work king fox's launcher my friend chris me being their slave.[/center]

item.title: Rune-Sanctum Release
item.dc:creator: @runehonor runehonor
item.description:
@runehonor wrote:

No I do not feel bad for releasing this before I did not sell a copy of it due to me losing most of the source files and client. this is just rebuilt ones.

cache: https://www.sendspace.com/file/ewikx0
source+client: https://www.sendspace.com/file/hzy9oj
SQL files!: https://www.sendspace.com/file/qcab18

[center]Core re-work for great server stability
Friendly and active community
Duo Slayer
Dwarf multi cannon
In game PvP highscores
Perfect item switches for amazing hybridding
Flawless combat system
Client settings - Including 100% fullscreen & resizeable
A unique Donator zone with many Donator benefits
All skills fully working and being worked on every day
Daily server and website updates
A hard working owner who listens to his players
Pk Points for killing players and Voting Points both with amazing reward shops
Many bosses to defeat all dropping well rewarding items!
Clean and efficient client, small cache size and low memory usage
Many mini-games including fully working duel arena with staking
The server is hosted on a powerful VPS which is ran 24/7 for 100% uptime
Great combat rates so you may enjoy the server for as long as possible without losing interest fast!
Max cape for players who accomplish all 99’s
Highscores and auto donations
And many, many more features join today to see them for your self!
Multi world management system!
Rewrote smithing
Rewrote agility
rewrote herblore
fixed 3 dupes.
fixed some npc anims gfx and block anims.
New and improved login screen
redone slayer system.
Fixed all the packet crashs
Fixed the command system.
rewrote whole command system
Implemented mac ban.
Implemented hwid ban.
Implemented Jag Grab system.
Added some newer items.
Newer dungeons.
And some other stuff I might of forgot.
Added a d cannon bug prevention system.
and much more.
started working on BH System
Fixed pvp tokens.
Fixed some npc’s and gave em names

Added every rs pet from 2007 to 2009
Added boss pets.
Added Rev pets.
